name: Asparagus Soup
author: Pyromommy
summary: Velvety asparagus soup, lovely green color, great with crunchy rolls.  My friend gave me this recipe, it originally used chicken broth.  When my daughter became vegetarian, I modified it with vegetable broth instead!  It also doubles easily.  This soup will tempt even asparagus haters!
ingredients: 1 pound fresh asparagus, trimmed and coarsely chopped
directions: Microwave onion and butter on HIGH for 2 minutes
Add asparagus, vegetable broth, garlic powder and white pepper
Microwave, covered, on HIGH for 10 to 12 minutes
Return mixture to microwave safe dish, stir in milk and microwave until heated through
